channel.title: Anyone know how to make Ice Barrage hit more then 1 monster?
channel.description:
Just asking cause my ice barrage when clicked on only hits one, hoping to hit in a 10 x 10 grid.
Thanks! ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2007, 09:20:35 PM[/size][hr]AND I KNOW THIS ISNT HELP SECTION, BUT NO ONE EVER HELPS IN HELP SECTION!! [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Do not double post[/center]

item.title: Anyone know how to make Ice Barrage hit more then 1 monster?
item.dc:creator: @bugsweeper2 bugsweeper2
item.description:
@bugsweeper2 wrote:

warnings are nothing honestly.

But, in my previous server, my fishing started decreasing for soem weird reason.

It was "-1268* LOL :eek:

client.java:24121: cannot find symbol symbol : method attackNPCSWithin(int,int,int) location: class client attackNPCSWithin(453, 30, 4); ^ stream.java:232: warning: [deprecation] getBytes(int,int,byte[],int) in java.lan g.String has been deprecated s.getBytes(0, s.length(), buffer, currentOffset); ^ PlayerSave.java:3: warning: [serial] serializable class PlayerSave has no defini tion of serialVersionUID public class PlayerSave implements Serializable ^ SaveGameHandler.java:7: warning: [serial] serializable class SaveGameHandler has no definition of serialVersionUID public class SaveGameHandler implements Serializable { ^ 1 error 3 warnings Press any key to continue . . .

If you could help me with those warnings to lol
